text: Bérurier Noir are a French punk band which formed in Paris in 1983. It is made up of Loran (guitar), François (vocals) and Dede (drum machine). In 1985 Masto joined, playing the saxophone. They sing about French politics and anarchism. They are one of the most famous French punk bands. ==Discography== * 1983: Macadam massacre * 1985: Concerto pour détraqués * 1987: Abracadaboum * 1989: Souvent fauché, toujours marteau * 1990: Viva Bertaga (Live 1989) * 1995: Carnaval des agités (Best Of/Live 1983-1989) * 1998: La bataille de Pali-Kao (Best Of 1983-1989) * 2003: Même pas mort (DVD+CD Best Of+News) * 2005: L'Opéra des Loups (DVD+CD Live 16 titles or DVD only) * 2006: Chant des Meutes (Live 13 titles) * 2006: Invisible ==Other websites== * Official site * http://www.fzm.fr/ Category:French musical groups Category:Rock bands Category:Punk bands
